text: (yeh saza thi) ba sabab inn ki ehad shikni kay aur ehkaam-e-elahee kay sath kufur kerney kay aur Allah kay nabiyon ko na haq qatal ker daalney kay aur iss sabab say kay yun kehtay hain kay humaray dilon per ghilaf hai. Halankay dar asal inn kay kufur ki waja say inn kay dilon per Allah Taalaa ney mohar laga di hai iss liye yeh qadar-e-qaleel hi eman latay hain
